message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and rarity, it is worth noting that the product holds a significant importance to both of us. Considering its worth to you stands at $1,200,000, I am offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer represents a substantial saving compared to its intrinsic value, providing you with an exceptional opportunity to own something truly remarkable. I trust this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of facilitating this transaction.
